experience.summary: Experienced in the Cloud/Business software application development, High Performance Computing, Infrastructure Support and Services.
points: Strong hold on Data Structures and algorithms with understanding of native data structure as well as implementation of their variants.
Proficient and having strong knowledge of developing stable business applications with high IT security following complete SDLC.
Strong server administration, troubleshooting skills and good understanding of system administration and development protocols.
Good exposure in Project Management Process Groups on a solution implementation for IT E-commerce & Infrastructure application development.
Good Communication, Interpersonal and Client Interfacing skills with the ability to manage work pressure and timelines effectively.
With holding versatile skill set (Developer, Analyst & System administrator), result oriented, innovative thought process and eagerness to learn.

resposibilities: Working to enhance music entertainment experience on and through Alexa app.
Build new feature of the app, using React Native, and building services in Java and Kotlin.
Design, build and maintain high scale Infrastructure of music experience as Infrastructure as Code.
Create and deploy monitoring alarms for services and apps, to monitor health of service and application.
Handle on-call shifts once in two months for each service of the team.

certification.name: RHCE
certification.title: Red Hat Certified Engineer
description: Understand and use essential tools for handling files, directories, command-line environments, and documentation
Operate running systems, including booting into different run levels, identifying processes, starting and stopping virtual machines, and controlling services
Configure local storage using partitions and logical volumes
Create and configure file systems and file system attributes, such as permissions, encryption, access control lists, and network file systems
Deploy, configure, and maintain systems, including software installation, update, and core services
Manage users and groups, including use of a centralized directory for authentication
Manage security, including basic firewall and SELinux configuration

certification.name: RHS333 & EX333
certification.title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in Security: Network Services
description: Mastering basic service security
Understanding and using cryptographic tools
Securing Berkley Internet Name Domain (BIND) and Domain Name Service (DNS)
Hardening remote procedure call (RPC) services
Using Kerberos for centrally managed user authentication
Improving network file system (NFS) security with Kerberos and NFSv4
Using secure shell (SSH) for tunneling and other advanced purposes
Building a secure email infrastructure
Securing File Transfer Protocol (FTP) and HTTP services
Conducting basic intrusion detection and response

certification.name: RH423 & EX423
certification.title: Red Hat Certified Specialist in Directory Services and Authentication
description: Understanding and use basic LDAP concepts
Installing, configuring, and managing Red Hat Directory Server.
Managing authentication on Red Hat Enterprise LinuxÂ® systems using pluggable authentication modules (PAM) and glibc name switch service (NSS).
Using Kerberos and LDAP to centrally manage user authentication.
Configuring Red Hat Enterprise Linux systems to use Microsoft Active Directory for authentication.
